remarks: A topological space depends only on the base and topology components. (Contributed by NM, 18-Jul-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)
statement:
tpspropd.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` L ) ) $.
tpspropd.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( TopOpen ` K ) = ( TopOpen ` L ) ) $.
tpspropd $p |- ( ph -> ( K e. TopSp <-> L e. TopSp ) ) $.
